description: Make these easy beef fajitas for a midweek meal. Everyone will love the zesty flavour of the tomato avocado salad alongside the delicious char of the beef.
name: Beef Fajitas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Continental Recipe Base Chilli Con Carne
500g beef rump steak, trimmed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomato, avocado, coriander, lime juice and 1/2 tablespoon oil in a bowl. Combine recipe base and 2 tablespoons oil in a large bowl. Add beef, toss to coat. Place capsicum and onion in another large bowl. Add remaining 1/2 tablespoon oil, toss to coat.

Heat a barbecue flat plate, or large non-stick frying pan, over high heat. Add capsicum and onion mixture. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened and slightly charred. Transfer to a bowl. Cover to keep warm.
Reduce heat to medium-high. Cook beef, in batches, for 1-2 minutes for medium or until cooked to your liking. Add to capsicum and onion, toss to combine.
Prepare tortillas according to packet directions. Serve with beef mixture, tomato avocado salad and fresh lime halves.
